result.execSummary:
The defendant Matthew Alan Low was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: DOC Collect.  If discharged from extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt: 2:21 PM Defendant Matthew Alan Low in court in custody.  Attorney Kelly James Mattingly in court for Matthew Alan Low.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart in court for the State of Wisconsin. Amended Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Defendant pleads guilty. Court finds the defendant guilty. PSI waived. Court orders sixteen years in the Wisconsin State Prison system, eight years Prison with eight years extended supervision with conditions, No contact with D.S. and D.S. Family, Complete any assessment/treatment/counseling deemed necessary. Sex Offender Treatment and Sex Offender Extended Supervision  . DOC to collect court costs. Court orders Lifetime Sex offender registry. Felony rights given to defendant. 181 days credit.

9:30AM Defendant Matthew Alan Low appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kelly James Mattingly appeared by video for Matthew Alan Low.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 11:30 am.

04:03 PM Defendant Matthew Alan Low in court  in custody appearing by video with attorney Kelly James Mattinglyappearing by video.  Mason C Braunschweig appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily, rights given.  Court binds Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Information filed, copy to defendant, reading waived.  Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by Court.  Jury trial to be set. Remand to branch 7 for scheduling.

Activity: Initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:28 PM Defendant Matthew Alan Low in court in custody at the Rock County Jail with attorney Kelly James Mattingly by video. Noah M Tylenda appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Andrea Ehret by video for victim witness office. Victim K.S. appeared by audio. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address verified. Cash bond set of $10,000.00 with conditions: No contact directly or indirectly with victims D.S. or K.S. or any of their family members, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No contact with any minors. Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint. Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. Court continues matter to March 16, 2022 at 3PM.
